sentences: Eibhlis Farrell (born 27 July 1953) is a Northern Irish composer.
Eibhlis Farrell was born in Rostrevor in County Down, Northern Ireland.

She began writing music at an early age and studied at Queen's University, Belfast, where she graduated with a Bachelor of Music, and with Raymond Warren at Bristol University, graduating with a Masters in composition.
She also studied with Charles Wuorinen and Robert Moevs, and graduated from Rutgers University, New Jersey, with a doctorate.
